title: An unknow DirectX error has occuried
body:
https://i.imgur.com/3cF4wGt.png
I updated my graphics card today, restarted pc, joined my friends party, game started and then boom.
Like I said, I updated my graphics card
DirectX is up-to-date
Windows 8.1 isn't and right now I'm updating it
Maybe there's a problem that my operating system that isn't updated or I don't know what is the problem

plz halp{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

Edit1: Updating Windows didn't help, still looking for solutions

Edit2: Solved, GeForce Experience didn't intall my graphics card drivers properly, so I reinstalled my graphics card drivers and everything is working now.

replies.body: Updating Windows was definitely a good step, just to make sure you have any necessary products.  This error is usually caused by a driver failure, so it does seem like it's not installing or working properly.  Try out the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help with this, test it in custom games, and let me know if it helps.
I'm reinstalling my graphics card because after getting error in Borderlands 2, I think that I didn't intalled it properly so right now I'm reinstalling it and I'll tell you if I fixed my problem

Found out what happend.
I think Geforce Experience didn't intall graphics card update properly, so I uninstalled my graphic card driver and intalled again and that solved my problem.
Thanks for help tho

-RageTHD
